蘗字的基本解释

蘗
bò
古同“檗”：“剉蘗染黄丝。”

蘗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bò］
［《集韻》博厄切，入麥，幫。］
同“檗1”。
黄柏。落叶乔木。树皮味苦，可入药，古代亦用作染料。

蘗字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蘗； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1069第08
【集韻】博厄切，音擘。【唐韻】俗檗字。【說文】黃木也。或从薛。【本草】李時珍曰：蘗，木名。義未詳。俗作黃柏者，省寫之譌也。【鮑昭·行路難】剉蘗染黃絲，黃絲歷亂不可治。　又與薛通。詳薜字註。

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bò］
["Jiyun" Boheche, enter the wheat, help. ]
Same as "檗1".
Cork. Deciduous trees. The bark tastes bitter and can be used as medicine. It was also used as a dye in ancient times.
Tiller
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　蘖; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1069-08
[Jiyun] Boheche, sound. 【Tang Yun】vulgar characters. [Said the text] Huang Mu also. Or from Xue. [Materia Medica] Li Shizhen said: Tiller, wooden name. The meaning is unclear. Those who are commonly used as cork, the province writes Jiao. 【Bao Zhao·Difficulty in traveling】The yellow silk is dyed with tiller, and the yellow silk cannot be cured.　Tong with Xue again.
